languages.text: {n}Хальбрандт и Ульфар, словно два музыканта, достигают абсолютного ритма слов, дыхания и движений. С яростным воем бросаются в атаку, двигаясь будто одно целое.{/n}

{n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хальбрандт и Ульфар, словно два музыканта, достигают абсолютного ритма слов, дыхания и движений. С яростным воем бросаются в атаку, двигаясь будто одно целое.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}

{n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}

{n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}

{n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}

languages.text: {n}哈尔布兰特与乌尔法宛如两位技艺精湛的乐师一样，他们的语言、呼吸与动作完美地融合在一起。伴随着一声凶狠的怒吼，两人朝敌人冲了过去，仿佛不再是两个人，而是合而为一。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}哈尔布兰特与乌尔法宛如两位技艺精湛的乐师一样，他们的语言、呼吸与动作完美地融合在一起。伴随着一声凶狠的怒吼，两人朝敌人冲了过去，仿佛不再是两个人，而是合而为一。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ふたりの名演奏家のように、ハルブラントとウルファーは言葉、呼吸、動きを完璧に同調させている。どう猛なうめき声と共に攻撃に走る様は、ふたりの戦士が一体となったかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ふたりの名演奏家のように、ハルブラントとウルファーは言葉、呼吸、動きを完璧に同調させている。どう猛なうめき声と共に攻撃に走る様は、ふたりの戦士が一体となったかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Halbrandt y Ulfar, cuales músicos prolíficos, se enzarzan en un ritmo perfecto de palabras, pausas y movimiento. Con un feroz aullido, se lanzan al ataque, moviéndose como si no fueran dos guerreros, sino uno solo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt y Ulfar, cuales músicos prolíficos, se enzarzan en un ritmo perfecto de palabras, pausas y movimiento. Con un feroz aullido, se lanzan al ataque, moviéndose como si no fueran dos guerreros, sino uno solo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comme deux musiciens virtuoses, Halbrandt et Ulfar se lancent à l'attaque dans un hurlement féroce. Ils accordent à la perfection leurs paroles, leur souffle et leurs mouvements, comme s'ils ne formaient qu'un seul et même guerrier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme deux musiciens virtuoses, Halbrandt et Ulfar se lancent à l'attaque dans un hurlement féroce. Ils accordent à la perfection leurs paroles, leur souffle et leurs mouvements, comme s'ils ne formaient qu'un seul et même guerrier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wie zwei virtuose Musiker fallen Halbrandt und Ulfar in einen perfekten Rhythmus aus Worten, Atem und Bewegung. Mit wildem Geheul stürzen sie sich in den Angriff, als wären sie nicht zwei Krieger, sondern einer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie zwei virtuose Musiker fallen Halbrandt und Ulfar in einen perfekten Rhythmus aus Worten, Atem und Bewegung. Mit wildem Geheul stürzen sie sich in den Angriff, als wären sie nicht zwei Krieger, sondern einer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Halbrandt ve Ulfar, iki usta sanatçı gibi kelimelerin, nefesin ve hareketlerin ritmine kapılıyor. Vahşi bir ulumayla saldırıya geçiyorlar. Bedenleri tek bir savaşçı olmuş gibi hareket ediyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Like two virtuosic musicians, Halbrandt and Ulfar fall into a perfect rhythm of words, breath, and movement. With a fierce howl, they rush to the attack, moving as if they are not two warriors, but one.{/n}
